short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to instantly insert your available calendar times.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With Nicky you have your best available times at your finger tips. The extension syncs with your calendar and with one-click it will propose ideal meeting times for you. You can also type the shortcut "/nicky" to have your proposals inserted at your cursor.

Supports Google Calendar only.

This means the recipient no longer has to make the effort to look through your calendar to find a time that works, Nicky does that for you.

Planned feature releases:
- Improved UI
- Additional custom shortcuts such as "/3d" to get times in the next 3 days
- Improving the AI that finds the best time by learning from when you prefer to take calls and meetings
- Support for other calendars such as Outlook
- More customization for time proposals.
